product_name: Mountain N' Air Books Pocket Profile John Muir Trail and PCT Map
long_description: The Pocket Profile John Muir and PCT map is the perfect-size companion for moment-by-moment reference when you're on the John Muir portion of the Pacfic Crest Trail.
short_description: The Pocket Profile John Muir and PCT map is the perfect-size companion for moment-by-moment reference when you're on the John Muir portion of the Pacfic Crest Trail.
